DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether accelerated partial breast irradiation (APBI) with multi-catheter brachytherapy is safe and effective.
DOC.brief_title: Partial Breast Irradiation With Multi-Catheter Brachytherapy for pT1-2pN0 Breast Cancer After Breast Conserving Surgery
DOC.criteria: pT1/2 (≤ 3 cm) pN0 or pN1 mi M0 and no contralateral BC Clear margins (≥ 2 mm) Age ≥ 35 years ER and/or PR positive Multifocality or Multicentricity EIC Lymphovascular invasion Poorly differentiated tumors Diffuse microcalcifications
